metadata.Title: CVE-2016-6238 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The write_ujpg function in lepton/jpgcoder.cc in Dropbox lepton 1.0 allows remote attackers to cause denial of service (out-of-bounds read) via a crafted jpeg file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-6238` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

lepton - 1.2.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: lepton package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.2.1-1').
